statements: SELECT * FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, compliance_status FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, compliance_status, last_updated FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT compliance_status FROM HealthcareCompliance;
SELECT * FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT employee_name, compliance_status FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, compliance_status FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE compliance_status IN ('Completed', 'Pending')
SELECT * FROM HealthcareCompliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Completed' AND last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, compliance_status FROM HealthcareCompliance GROUP BY compliance_status
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData
SELECT patient_id, compliance_score FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_score > 80
SELECT compliance_status, compliance_date FROM ComplianceData ORDER BY compliance_date DESC
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_title FROM PolicyGuidelines
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant'
SELECT * FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, compliance_score FROM ComplianceData WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT c.patient_id, c.compliance_date, p.guideline_title FROM ComplianceData c JOIN PolicyGuidelines p ON c.compliance_score < 50 AND c.compliance_status = 'Incomplete';
SELECT DISTINCT c.compliance_status FROM ComplianceData c INNER JOIN PolicyGuidelines p ON c.compliance_score >= 70;
SELECT * FROM PolicyGuidelines WHERE guideline_title LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitor ORDER BY standard_name DESC, last_checked ASC;
SELECT organization_id, compliance_status FROM ComplianceMonitor WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, policy_name, effective_date FROM HealthcarePolicyGuidelines WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceLog WHERE status = FALSE;
SELECT monitor_id, policy_id, check_date FROM ComplianceLog ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitor WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT id, organization_id, standard_name FROM ComplianceMonitor WHERE organization_id = '4b4e5f3b-3dd9-4158-a0fa-23500d0cd4da' ORDER BY standard_name ASC;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM HealthcarePolicyGuidelines WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, status, check_date FROM ComplianceLog WHERE monitor_id = '06c3e79c-6213-4ca5-89ae-4c03bd9536f9' AND status = FALSE ORDER BY check_date ASC;
SELECT monitor_id, COUNT(id) AS total_checks FROM ComplianceLog GROUP BY monitor_id HAVING total_checks > 10 ORDER BY total_checks DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospital;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProvider ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT provider_id, regulation_id, compliance_date FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_name ASC, hospital_id DESC
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospital WHERE compliance_status = true
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProvider WHERE hospital_id = 2
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecord WHERE compliance_status = false ORDER BY compliance_date DESC
SELECT hospital_name, COUNT(provider_id) AS num_providers FROM Hospital LEFT JOIN HealthcareProvider ON Hospital.hospital_id = HealthcareProvider.hospital_id GROUP BY hospital_name
SELECT * FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT report_id, compliance_rating, policy_reference FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT * FROM Violations WHERE violation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT violation_description, violation_date FROM Violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, inspector_name FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_rating FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT * FROM Violations WHERE violation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, COUNT(violation_id) AS num_violations FROM Violations GROUP BY report_id HAVING num_violations > 3;
SELECT department_name, inspector_name FROM Inspections WHERE inspection_date = '2021-10-15';
